casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffery Neal DUKE. No. 57A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of December 2007 by Defendant of Appeal and Denial of Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
